title: Will You Spend $70 on The Last of Us Part I? - Kinda Funny Funny Games Daily 07.22.22
description:
Go to http://expressvpn.com/kindafunny to get an extra 3 months free. 

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order plus 25% off your first membership item. 

Go to http://athleticgreens.com/kindafunny to get a free 1-year supply of Vitamin D and 5 free travels packs with your first purchase.

Giant Bomb's Tamoor Hussain joins Greg to talk through all The Last of Us Part I details, Assassin's Creed rumors, and pro wrestling memories. 

Follow Tam: https://twitter.com/tamoorh
